articles.description: Colo Colo in a statement said that the attendees "did not respect the minimum standards of behaviour"
articles.content:
Two advertising hoardings collapsed
During an open training session hosted by Chilean club Colo Colo, several fans were injured after a part of a roof collapsed in an Estadio Monumental stadium in C… [+1996 chars]
